plugin.name: mb
plugin.description: Body wave magnitude at teleseismic distances

binding.name: mb
binding.description: Body wave magnitude at teleseismic distances measured at 1 s period.

group.name: mb
group.description: Parameters for computing mb magnitudes from mb amplitudes.

parameter.name: minDist
parameter.description: Minimum epicentral distance for computing mb. Note: According to the IASPEI recommendations in 2013, the minimum distance should be 20 deg.

parameter.name: maxDist
parameter.description: Maximum epicentral distance for computing mb.
